## InclusionResolver type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type InclusionResolver<S extends Entity, T extends Entity> = (
sourceEntities: S[], 
inclusion: Inclusion<AnyObject>, 
options?: Options) => Promise<(T | undefined)[] | (T[] | undefined)[]>;
```
